Translations.Text: And it is not for a man that God should speak to him except ( through inspirational ) communication or from behind a veil or by sending a messenger who communicates by His permission what He wills, He is certainly High, Wise

And thus ( in the manner listed last above ), We have communicated to you ( through ) the spirit ( angel Gabriel, the message ), by Our command. You did not know what the book was nor ( did you know what ) the belief ( was ), but We made it a light, guiding thereby, whom We will of Our servants, and you are certainly guiding towards the straight path, the book was nor ( did you know what ) the belief ( was ), but We made it a light, guiding thereby, whom We will of Our servants, and you are certainly guiding towards the straight path
the path of God, Whose is whatever is in the skies and whatever is in the earth. Beware ! towards God is the destination of affairs
Haa Mim
By the book that makes ( things ) clear
We have made it an Arabic Quran that you may understand
And it is in the original book with Us, high, full of wisdom
What ! shall We then keep away the reminder from you, ignoring ( you, just ) because you are an extravagant people
And how many a prophet did We send among the ancients
And there did not come to them ( any ) prophet but they mocked at him
So We destroyed those who were stronger than these in taking hold, and the example of the ancients has gone ( before them)
And if you ask them, “Who created the skies and the earth?” They will definitely say, “The Mighty, the Knowing has created them.”
He Who made the earth ( suitable for ) habitation for you, and He made for you roads therein, that you may find the right way
And He Who sent down water from the sky according to a programme, then We raise ( to life ) therewith a dead land, thus, you ( too ) will be brought out
And He Who created pairs of all ( things ) and made for you the ships, and from among the cattle , those on which you ride

that you may balance yourselves on their backs, then remember the favour of your Lord on you when you balance yourselves on them and say, “Glorified be He Who has subjected these to us ( for our use ) and we were not able to do it
and we will certainly return to our Lord.”
And they assign to Him from His servants, a part ( as sons, daughters, partners, etc), man to be certain is clearly ungrateful
What ! has He taken daughters from what He has created and chosen sons for you
And when one of them is given the news of ( the birth of a daughter, something ) similar to that which he assigns to the Beneficent ( God ), his face is shadowed black and he is full of grief
What ! ( do they assign to God daughters ) who are brought up in ornaments and who are without clarity during a dispute
And they regard the angels, who are servants of the Beneficent ( God ), ( as ) females. Did they witness their creation? Their evidence will be recorded and they will be questioned
And they say, “If the Beneficent ( God ) had willed, we would not have worshipped them.” They do not have any knowledge about that, they do nothing but guess
Or did We give them a book before this so that they are holding fast to it
No, they say, “We found our fathers on ( these ) religious procedures and we are guided by their footsteps.”
And thus We had not sent any warner before you to any town but those well-off therein, said, “We found our fathers on ( these ) religious procedures and we are followers of their footsteps.”
